abstract: Chris Carpenter and Yovani Gallardo have turned in the top two pitching performances of the 2011 playoffs and will face each other Wednesday night in Game 3 of the N.L.C.S.
snippet: Chris Carpenter and Yovani Gallardo have turned in the top two pitching performances of the 2011 playoffs and will face each other Wednesday night in Game 3 of the N.L.C.S.

headline.main: Another Chance for a Pitching Duel
